title: The Murder of Kim Nees with Rebecca Lavoie
itunes:title: The Murder of Kim Nees with Rebecca Lavoie
description:
Good evening and welcome to Nighty Night with Rabia Chaudry: Bedtime Stories To Keep You Awake. Tonight we start our first 'Story Behind the Story' installment as Rabia sits down with True Crime expert Rebecca Lavoie to discuss the crime that inspired "Down By The River."  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
